martialAbilities.name: Basic Attack
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Basic Ranged Attack
martialAbilities.description: Ranged Martial Attack, reasonable range, on hit: [LIGHT MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Quick Attack I (1/[TURN])
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [LIGHT MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Quick Attack II (2/[TURN])
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [LIGHT MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Quick Attack III
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [LIGHT MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Heavy Attack
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [HEAVY MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Ranged Attack
martialAbilities.description: Ranged Martial Attack, reasonable range, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Quick Bash
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: if exceeds Toughness recieve [STUNNED I].

martialAbilities.name: Cleave I
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach 2 targets, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Cleave II
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach multiple targets, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Cleave III
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach multiple targets, on hit: [HEAVY MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Cleave IV
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach multiple targets, on hit: [HEAVY MARTIAL DAMAGE].

martialAbilities.name: Crippling Strike I
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE] and if exeeds hardness, is now [CRIPPLED I].

martialAbilities.name: Crippling Strike II
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [HEAVY MARTIAL DAMAGE] and if exeeds hardness, is now [CRIPPLED II].

martialAbilities.name: Crippling Strike III
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE] and if exeeds hardness, is now [CRIPPLED II].

martialAbilities.name: Stunning Strike
martialAbilities.description: Melee Martial Attack, [MEELE RANGE] reach, on hit: [MEDIUM MARTIAL DAMAGE] and if exeeds toughenss, is now [STUNNED I].

spellAbilities.name: Basic Spell Attack
spellAbilities.description: Melee Spell Attack, [MELEE RANGE] reach, on hit: [MEDIUM SPELL DAMAGE] cosmic.

spellAbilities.name: Basic Ranged Spell Attack
spellAbilities.description: Ranged Spell Attack, reasonable range, on hit: [LIGHT SPELL DAMAGE] cosmic.

spellAbilities.name: Decaying Touch
spellAbilities.description: Melee Spell Attack, [MELEE RANGE] reach, on hit: [MEDIUM SPELL DAMAGE] unholy if exceeds [TOUGHNESS], creature recieves [DECAYING] for 1 [TURN].

otherAbilities.name: Pounce I
otherAbilities.description: Jump, on landing select 1 target within [MELEE RANGE]: 10 + Martial Level + STR or fall prone.

otherAbilities.name: Pounce II
otherAbilities.description: Jump, on landing select multiple targets within [MELEE RANGE]: 10 + Martial Level + STR or fall prone.
